== Introduction ==

We are preparing Kubuntu Yakkety Yak (16.10) for distribution on  <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/YakketyYak/ReleaseSchedule | October 13th, 2016]]</nowiki>. With this '''Beta 2''' pre-release, you can see what we are trying out in preparation for our next version.

'''NOTE:''' 

This is Beta 2 Release. 
Kubuntu '''Beta Releases''' are '''NOT''' recommended for:
* Regular users who are not aware of pre-release issues
* Anyone who needs a stable system
* Anyone uncomfortable running a possibly frequently broken system
* Anyone in a production environment with data or workflows that need to be reliable

Kubuntu Beta Releases are recommended for:
* Regular users who want to help us test by finding, reporting, and/or fixing bugs
* Kubuntu, KDE, and Qt developers

== Designed to be a Breeze, Plasma 5 is now the default ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:YY-Beta2-BreezeSS.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| '''Plasma 5''', the next generation of KDE's desktop has been rewritten to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.  The <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/plasma-5.7.0.php|seventh set of updates to Plasma 5 (current release, including the fixpack)]]</nowiki> is the default in this version of Kubuntu.
|}

== KDE Applications version 15.12 ==

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <nowiki>[[File:DolphinYYBeta2.png
| width=600]]</nowiki>
| Kubuntu comes with <nowiki>[[https://www.kde.org/announcements/announce-applications-15.12.0.php|KDE Applications 15.12]]</nowiki> containing all your favorite apps from KDE, including Dolphin. This is the first stability update, and contains bugfixes and translation updates. 126 applications have been ported to <nowiki>[[https://dot.kde.org/2013/09/25/frameworks-5|KDE Frameworks 5]]</nowiki> but those which aren't should fit in seamlessly.<<BR>><<BR>>Non-KDE applications include <nowiki>[[https://www.libreoffice.org/discover/new-features/|LibreOffice 5.2.1.2]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/48.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 48]]</nowiki>.
|}

== Feedback ==

Development of Kubuntu 16.10, Yakkety Yak, is ongoing and bugs are fixed every day.  Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date.  For verifying installation related bugs, updated disk images are available from <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/daily-live/current/|Daily bootable images for standard PCs and laptops]]</nowiki>.

You can give us feedback on <nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|Google +]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://plus.google.com/u/0/107577785796696065138/posts|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Gplus.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|Facebook]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/kubuntu.org|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-FB.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|Twitter]]</nowiki><nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-Twitter.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]] or <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|Linkedin]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/kubuntu|<nowiki>[[File:Kubuntu-linkedin.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]].
